string.value: Haikai suru tozoku nitotte, shinseina mono nado nani mo nai. Karera no kogeki wa, ichi nin no tabibitodearo to buso shita kyarabantaidearoto, dare demo hyoteki ni suru koto ga dekiru.
Karera wa suriru o motomete sekaiju o kake meguru. Totsuzen no kozeriai de wa, kogekigawa ni mo bogyogawa ni mo kuwawaru koto ga dekiru.
Saikin wa hotondo inaku nattaga, moshi ekusupurora ni au koto ga dekireba, tanoshi kaiwa to komatta toki no tedasuke ga kitai dekiru.
Dono habatsu ni mo zokusanai dokuritsu shita toreda wa, saisho ni atta hito to yorokonde torihiki suru.
Kono sonkei sareru girudo wa, bunmei sekai de mottomo kikenna faita de kosei sareteiru. Karera wa kin o harau mono no gawa de tatakai, meiyo no okite o mamoru.
Konnanna jidai ni wa, saigai no zencho ga itaru tokoro ni arawareru.

Katsute karera no sosen ga sodeatta yo ni, nomintachi wa tochi o tagayasu. Dare mo ga tsuneni shokuryo o hitsuyo to shi, karera kara ubau mono wa ta ni nani mo nai tame, karera wa kiken ni michita sekai de hissori to sonzai shiteiru.

Shomin wa kono gurupu o kiratteiru. Toiunomo, kodai sekai no chishiki o atsumeru keimokatachi wa, kogakuna hoshu o eru kotode shika chishiki o kyoyu shinaikarada. Sarani, karera wa yohei toshite kodo suru koto ga hotondode, joheki no hogoka ni tomaru koto o konomu.

Sekiyu no torihiki de saisho no shuto o kizuita seijitsuna sh?nintachi. Sonogo, hito o yosetsukenai kita no heru chiho ni shinshutsu shi, toshi zentai o kensetsu shita. Fukinshinna raibarutachi wa karera ni shitto shi, bogai kosaku o soshiki suru.

Kako ni okashita ikutsu ka no fushoji ya, samazamana gyangu ya yohei to no tsunagari kara, karera o 'shikuretto araiansu' to yobu hito mo iru. Domei ga tohin o kaishime, mitsuyuhin no torihiki mo jisanai to kangaeru no mo muri hanai.

Fetarando no kenryoku o shoaku shiyo to suru su oku no gyangu no hitotsuda. Karera ga kodai no gunji kichi ni sennyu shi, keikaku o tassei suru tame no shin no chikara o te ni ireta kotode, jokyo wa fukuzatsu ni natteiru.
Ejji no hiyokuna heigen ni sumitsuki, ta no gyangu kara hogo suru kawari ni nomin kara mitsugibutsu o atsumeru sho akutotachi. Kono jokyo wa koko su nen tsuzuiteori, dare nitotte mo kotsugoda.
Gokkan no umi de nani ga ereru no ka wa fumeidaga, karera wa yutakana seikatsu o okutteiru. Bugaisha to kooeki suru koto mo aruga, keikoku nashi ni gaikokujin o osoo koto no hoo ga ooi.

Karisuma-teki shidoo-sha akuseru ni shokuhatsu sa reta aruzan no juumin wa, katsute jibun-tachi o okora seta rinjin to tatakau tame ni ichido no shoodoo de tachiagari, seiryoku-ken o kakudai suru koto ni seikoo shi, sarani ooku no mura o oshitsubushita. Karera wa arayuru shurui no yoohei ya kyooaku-han no hooshi o keibetsu shimasen.

Katsute wa chuusei o chikatteita rinjintachi no koogeki niyori, riburiamu no hitobito wa danketsu shi, sosen no kairitsu nishitagai, dokuritsu no tame ni tatakau koto o ketsui shita. Sensoo nioite wa , buryoku yori mo choohoo katsudoo ya hakai koosaku ni tayoru koto ga ooi.
Kono nazomeita soshiki ni wa sekaijuu ni shinpoosha ga iru. AR no sekkyoku tekina enjo niyori, shinri to chitsujo no tanky?sha toshite no hyooban wa yaya ochitaga, kyookai no eikyooryoku wa ookii.
Kono shizen no kodomotachi wa uchuu to heiwa ni kurashi, me ni mienai jumoku o sodate, sono ne de gishiki o okonau. Karera wa gaikokujin o kirai, daraku shita ningenda to kangaeteiru.

Katsute no doruido kyooto wa shinkoo ni genmetsu shi, kinzokusei no guuzoo o suuhai suru yoo ni natta. Karera wa umi no mukoo kara yattekita i hoshijin ni chuusei o chikai, susunde karera to kooeki o okonau. Tetsu no kodomotachi jishin mo, itsu no hi ka jibuntachi ga suuhai suru guuzoo to onaji kurai tsuyoi sutenresukoo no nikutai o te ni ireru koto o kitai shiteiru.
Orakuru no too no chikaku ni sumi, kare o kami toshite agameru chiisana shuuha.

Iwa o kudaki, kyoboku o taosu koto ga dekiru jigoku no honoo no shinpi tekina ikimono. Karera no ichizoku to sooguu sureba, tachimachi shi o maneku. Tetsu no kodomotachi dake ga karera to kyootsuu no kyoochi o miidasu koto ga dekiru.
Nagai sensoo de hakai sareta mono o saiken shiyoo to shiteiru oashia no genjuumintachi. Shikashi naze ka, karera wa jibuntachi ga hajimeta koto o owaraseru koto ga dekinai yooda...
Michi no teki no taema nai koogeki ni kurushimerareru min. Shikashi, naze ka karera wa kesshite katsu koto ga dekinai...
Memorii kiipaa to yobareru roojintachi wa daitoshi o hanare, chiisana komyuun o soshiki shita.
Wan daraa shinku teijuu nashi. Kimyoona otoko.
Seru no machi no juumintachi wa chuuritsu o tamochi, ryoo jinei ni denryoku o kyookyu shiteiru. Karera igai ni wa hatsudensho o iji suru koto wa dekinainode, kore made koogeki sareta koto hanai.
Kashifu shi no juumin. Kono chiiki no sekiyu o jisshitsu teki ni subete shihai shiteiru.
Kono hitotachi wa tekisetsuna furumai o shiteinai.
Ryakudatsu ni akiakishi, janguru de no kodoku dake ga karera no tamashii o sukuu.
Dare mo ga tetsu no shuukyoo ni najimeru wakede hanai.
Hoppoo booekishoo no torihiki aite. Ryooshi to te o musundeiru to omowareru.
Gokkan no umi de nani ga ereru no ka wa fumeidaga, karera wa yutakana seikatsu o okutteiru. Bugaisha to k?eki suru koto mo aruga, keikoku nashi ni gaikokujin o osoo koto no hoo ga ooi.
Poruto shi to orinpia mura no ma ni aru kodai iseki o tansaku suru kooko gakusha chiimu.
